chrome_web_store.name: SyncTabs - Cross Browser Tab Sync
chrome_web_store.short_description: View and sync open tabs across all your Chromium browsers. Tabs persist even after browser close.
chrome_web_store.detailed_description:
SyncTabs lets you see all your open tabs from every Chromium browser ‚Äî Chrome, Edge, Brave, Vivaldi, Opera ‚Äî in one place.

‚ú® FEATURES
‚Ä¢ View all your tabs from this browser in the popup
‚Ä¢ Tabs persist even after browser close or crash
‚Ä¢ Click tabs to switch to them instantly
‚Ä¢ Tabs grouped by browser window
‚Ä¢ Shows active tabs and pinned tabs
‚Ä¢ Dark themed, lightweight popup

üîó CROSS-BROWSER SYNC (optional)
Install the free SyncTabs Companion app to sync tabs across browsers:
‚Ä¢ See tabs from all your browsers in real-time
‚Ä¢ Tabs from offline browsers shown with 'last seen' timestamp
‚Ä¢ Everything stays on your machine ‚Äî no cloud, no account
‚Ä¢ Companion runs on localhost only (127.0.0.1)

üîí PRIVACY
‚Ä¢ No data is sent to any external server
‚Ä¢ No account required
‚Ä¢ All tab data stored locally
‚Ä¢ Optional Companion uses localhost only
‚Ä¢ Open source

‚öôÔ∏è HOW IT WORKS
Standalone: Extension saves your tabs locally and shows them in the popup.
With Companion: A lightweight local WebSocket server connects all your browsers for real-time tab sync.

Permissions:
‚Ä¢ tabs: Read your open tabs
‚Ä¢ storage: Save tabs and settings locally
‚Ä¢ alarms: Keep tabs saved and connection alive
‚Ä¢ localhost (optional): Connect to Companion for cross-browser sync
